landing.header: A PROFESSIONAL WEB DEVELOPER WITH EXPERIENCE ACROSS MULTIPLE CREATIVE PLATFORMS.
landing.bio1: My name is Krystal Guzman, and I am a full stack web developer. I create websites and apps that are both compelling and user-friendly. Through my intensive training at Lambda School, I mastered engineering dynamic user interfaces that are both efficient and intuitive.
landing.bio2: In the past, I have worked with children with special needs, and I have a strong desire to build websites and apps that are accessible to all people. I am eager to work with open-minded and motivated individuals that are ready to produce innovative results.

projects.title: Anywhere Fitness 1 – helps manage fitness class schedules

projects.title: DVST3 – provides financial cost for leaving a violent situation
projects.point1: • Worked as React 1 during a build week project
projects.point2: • Incorporated Router, Formik, and Axios to the front end

projects.title: Refugee Stories 2 – brings awareness to the refugee problem
projects.point1: • Developed marketing page as UI Designer, along with colleague
projects.point2: • Used Flexbox for GitHub cards and descriptions using HTML and LESS
